questionTitle: He hoped the appointment would enable him to gain greater ________ in publishing.
Your room is a mess! ________ it up at once!
Large waves were ________ on the seashore.
Their house is ________ near the Cathedral.
There was hardly ________ money left in my bank account.
They were making enough noise at the party to wake the ________.
Can you ________ me 5$ until next week?
As far as I know, she ________ back yet.
I've decided to join ________ this club .
Are you sure Miss Smith ________ use the new equipment?
His government insisted that he ________ until he finished his degree.
Because they usually receive the same score on standardized examinations, there is often disagreement as to ________ is the better student, Bob or Helen.
She remembered the correct address only ________ she had posted the letter.
The managers agreed to ________ the question of payment.
When he left school, John decided to ________ a priest instead of studying languages.
It is clearly not true  just a ________ and bull story.
Your brother is very tall. What is his exact ________?
Studying late at night is one of those things that ________ me tired .
He is a man who won't ________ his promise.
________ that he only started learning two years ago, his English is excellent.
